des: "I love Panera BreadÂ®'s Orchard Harvest Salad, but it's only offered seasonally so I came up with this very satisfying copycat version."
ins: Mix lettuce, pear slices, pecans, cherries, and Gorgonzola cheese together in a large bowl. Pour vinaigrette over the salad and toss to coat.
